2025-10-20.content:
[Support for TLS version 1.2 and later](https://docs.cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/secure-minimum-tls),
along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites, is in General Availability (GA).

summary.title: TLS 1.2 and later now supported
summary.summary: We are pleased to announce that support for TLS 1.2 and later is now generally available. This update includes a secure set of cipher suites, enhancing the security of your applications.

2025-08-07.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. [Update your application settings](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/secure-minimum-tls) in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).

summary.title: Security Update
summary.summary: App Engine flexible environment to use TLS 1.2 and later.

2025-07-30.content: Support for [Go 1.25 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/go/runtime) is in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages). This runtime is available for early testers using existing [release candidates](https://go.dev/dl/#unstable).

summary.title: Go 1.25 runtime available for early testers
Go 1.24 runtime now in preview
summary.summary: The Go 1.24 runtime is now available in preview for Google App Engine flexible environment. This update provides the latest features and improvements for Go developers.
